item.description:
Join us for a Summer Star Hop! We'll learn about the night sky with local astronomer Mike Thompson-Renzi and venture outside to look through telescopes at Jupiter and other various Messier objects. You might want to prepare for the Star Hop by visiting Mike's website Starhoo (www.starhoo.com)

Bring your own telescope or use ours. Children are welcome. Please leave your white light flashlights at home, as we will need dark surroundings to see the stars. (Bring dim red lights only.)

This is a Star Hop--meaning, it's a party! Bring your favorite party foods and non-alcoholic beverages to add to what we're bringing (not required). If the weather doesn't cooperate, we'll reschedule for a later date and email all who sign up here.

The MSSF Conference Building is the two-story building just a few steps north of the Headquarters parking lot. Signs from parking lot will direct you there.

Hope to see you there!

Melissa Guimont
Friends of Myles Standish State Forest
*FMSSF thanks the DCR for their partnership of this event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be up the hill in the brown barn/conference building. Please park in the main parking lot at headquarters.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Star Hop
